page.title: 05TERRACED HOUSE
page.content:
There are a lot of{terraced houses in Atherton,especially around the town centre. A{terraced house}in Atherton normally has a garden at the front and a yard at the back.Some of the{ {terraced houses}have a outside toilet and some don't. Most of the houses that have an outside toilet,have an inside one as well. Most of the houses are two bedroomed,with a bathroom,a kitchen and a lounge. One bedroom is very small and the other bedroom is very big.The bathroom is of fair size,and the kitchen and lounge is quite big.
{ANGELA FARRIMOND { }
